name: Libcint 5.1.6
body: * Add 4-center 1-electron integral int4c1e

name: Libcint 5.1.5
body:
* Add new integrals
  - int1e_r4: `< i | r^4 | j >`
  - int3c1e_ip1: `< \nabla i j | k >`

name: Libcint 5.1.3
body: * Add the missing cart2sph function for l=15

name: Libcint 5.1.2
body:
* Fix cint3c1e_cart integral (issue #67)
* Add new integrals 
  <i | nabla nabla r | j>
  <i | nabla r nabla | j>
  <i | nabla nabla nabla 1/r | j>
  <i | nabla nabla 1/r nabla | j>

name: Libcint 5.1.1
body: * Fix integer overflow in gto_norm

name: Libcint 5.1.0
body: * Update cint.h to make CINTEnvVars closed to the definition in qcint

name: Libcint 5.0.0
body:
* Improve the cartesian-spinor basis transformation 
* Remove the dependency to BLAS library 
* Update the header file cint.h 
* Update the drivers for cint2e, cint3c2e, cint3c1e, cint2c2e

name: Libcint 4.4.6
body: * Fix uninitialized variables in rys_roots

name: Libcint 4.4.5
body: A tag to match qcint version 4.4.5. This version is the same to release v4.4.4

name: Libcint 4.4.4
body: * Fix Cartesian-spherical and Cartesian-spinor transformation coefficients

name: Libcint 4.4.3
body:
* Fix divide-by-0 bug
* Improve performance of quadruple precision rys-roots function

name: Libcint 4.4.2
body: * Improve short-range ERI Rys-roots accuracy

name: Libcint 4.4.1
body: * Fix bugs in int1e_grids for attenuated Coulomb operators

name: Libcint 4.4.0
body:
* Add new integral type int1e_grids
* Fix cache size type
* Fix bugs in c2s transfomration for int1e_grids
* Fix bugs int1e_grids code generator
* Refactor cart2sph
* Refactor int1e drivers

name: Libcint 4.3.0
body:
* Add new integrals int1e_grids for operators 1/r_g (r_g is a list of grids)
* Fix integer overflow in cache_size for high order derivatives of high angular momentum basis

name: Libcint 4.2.0
body: * Change for all integral functions the return type from int to size_t

name: Libcint 4.1.3
body: * Fix memory address int32 overflow for heavily contracted basis (e.g. 4th order derivatives of [6f] basis)

name: Libcint 4.1.2
body: * Fix a bug due to significant digits of float128 in the core Fmt integrals

name: Libcint 4.1.1
body: Fix bug in Boys function evaluation kernel of short-range Coulomb integrals

name: Libcint 4.1.0
body:
* Add new Rys roots and weights algorithm
* Improve integral accuracy for high angular momentum basis
* Improve integral accuracy for short-range Coulomb integrals
* Add supports of 2-e integrals up to l=15

name: Libcint 4.0.7
body: * Fix bug in rys_roots when R_dsmit fails to find all roots

name: Libcint 4.0.6
body: * Fix return value bug in rysroots

name: Libcint 4.0.5
body: * Fix prescreening bug in int3c2e

name: Libcint 4.0.4
body: * Fix cache size bug in int3c1e

name: Libcint 4.0.3
body:
* Fix memory allocation bug in int3c1e
* Improve macro MALLOC_INSTACK

name: Libcint 4.0.2
body: * Fix function typedef bug in include/cint_funcs.h

name: Libcint 4.0.1
body: Update cmake configs and docs

name: Libcint 4.0.0
body:
* API Change. PTR_LIGHT_SPEED is replaced with PTR_EXPCUTOFF. Integral screening parameter can be passed through env[PTR_EXPCUTOFF]
* Add short-range integrals for range-separation
* Handle linear dependency in Rys polynomial
* Avoid calling exit function (issue #41)

name: Libcint 3.1.1
body: * Add p orbital convention (py, pz, px)

name: Libcint 3.0.20
body: * Fix integral ggkin

name: Libcint 3.0.19
body: Support fractional nuclear charges

name: Libcint 3.0.18
body:
* Fix undefined varialbe in nabla-rinv integral
* Add integral < i | nabla-rinv | j >

name: Libcint 3.0.17
body:
* 2nd order derivatives for 3c2e integral
* 3c2e and 2c2e integrals for Gaussian type geminals

name: Libcint 3.0.15
body:
* F12 second derivatives
* Add integrals for Gaussian type geminals
* Add 4th order derivatives of 2e integrals

name: Libcint 3.0.14
body: Add F12 integral derivatives

name: Libcint 3.0.13
body: Add integrals for multipole operators

name: Libcint 3.0.12
body: New integrals for the dipole operator with small components

name: Libcint 3.0.11
body: Fix Breit integrals

name: Libcint 3.0.10
body: Added multipolar integrals

name: Libcint 3.0.8
body: Fix Fortran APIs

name: Libcint 3
body: * Support of F12 integrals.

name: Update tests
body: Update tests for rpm build system.

name: Release for Debian/Fedora package system
body: Fix some build and test problems to fit in Debian/Fedora package system.
